helpModal.title: How to use the modeling editor

addClass.title: Add Class
addClass.text: To add a class, simply drag and drop one of the elements on the right side into the editor area on the left side.

editClass.title: Edit Class
editClass.text: To edit a class, double click it and a popup will open up, in which you can edit its components, e.g. name, attributes, methods, etc.

moveClass.title: Move Class
moveClass.text: To move a class, select it with a single click and either use your keyboard arrows or drag and drop it.

deleteClass.title: Delete Class
deleteClass.text: To delete a class, select it with a single click and either press Delete or Backspace on your keyboard.

addAssociation.title: Add Association
addAssociation.text: To add a association, select the source class with a single click and you will see four blue circles. Those are the possible connection points for associations. Click and hold on one of those and drag it to another blue circle to create a association.

editAssociation.title: Edit Association
editAssociation.text: To edit an association, double click it and a popup will open up, in which you can edit its properties, e.g. type.

deleteAssociation.title: Delete Association
deleteAssociation.text: To delete an association, select it with a single click and either press Delete or Backspace on your keyboard.

undo.title: Undo & Redo
undo.text: With Ctrl+Z and Ctrl+Y you can undo and redo your changes.
